name: Tainted Transmission
description:
Global Game Jam 2018 -- Adelaide site

Navigate a dangerous maze with only torchlight and your handy radar box. Be careful, you are not alone.

We decided to write a Wolf3d style raycasting engine from scratch in the Game Jam. Includes run-time dynamic coloured lighting, floor and ceiling textures and transparent walls.

We've seen several playtesters figure out the first map. We've not seen the second map solved yet.
